stories.Title: The quest for autonomy
stories.Description: Promises are turning into progress as Tesla strives to achieve "true" self-driving by year-end. The company has just deployed an update to employee testers, getting closer to public release.
stories.Tweet: The quest for autonomy 📦 Promises are turning into progress as Tesla strives to achieve "true" self-driving by year-end. The company has just deployed an update to employee testers, getting closer to public release. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/11/24/tesla-releasing-employees-fsd-v12-a-critical-update-self-driving-effort/

stories.Title: Eyes are on the prize
stories.Description: The EV market is shifting unexpectedly, and while most automakers may shy away from these changes, Hyundai is determined to push forward, halting production at its main factory to focus solely on EVs.
stories.Tweet: Eyes are on the prize 📦 The EV market is shifting unexpectedly, and while most automakers may shy away from these changes, Hyundai is determined to push forward, halting production at its main factory to focus solely on EVs. #hyundai https://electrek.co/2023/11/27/hyundai-suspend-main-factory-bolster-ev-production/

stories.Title: Bringing all the attention
stories.Description: Tesla's strategic move to showcase the Cybertruck in stores ahead of deliveries is paying off. Public interest isn't just confined to the electric truck—it's extended to other EVs in their lineup.
stories.Tweet: Bringing all the attention 📦 Tesla's strategic move to showcase the Cybertruck in stores ahead of deliveries is paying off. Public interest isn't just confined to the electric truck—it's extended to other EVs in their lineup. #tesla https://www.teslarati.com/tesla-cybertruck-displays-insane-attention-tesla-stores/

stories.Title: The future is robotics and AI
stories.Description: In an effort to adapt to China's fast-paced EV market, NIO has announced a workforce reduction of 30% over the next 6 years, aiming to shift its focus toward automation and AI.
stories.Tweet: The future is robotics and AI 📦 In an effort to adapt to China's fast-paced EV market, NIO has announced a workforce reduction of 30% over the next 6 years, aiming to shift its focus toward automation and AI. #NIO https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/nio-to-slash-workforce-by-30-as-it-bets-on-robots-and-ai

stories.Title: Save the date
stories.Description: Breaking from tradition, Tesla's Cybertruck delivery event is set to start at 1 p.m. CT. Details are limited at the moment, but maybe it's time to clear our schedules for November 30th.
stories.Tweet: Save the date 📦 Breaking from tradition, Tesla's Cybertruck delivery event is set to start at 1 p.m. CT. Details are limited at the moment, but maybe it's time to clear our schedules for November 30th. #tesla https://www.teslarati.com/tesla-exec-shares-cybertruck-first-delivery-event-details/

stories.Title: More helicopters, please!
stories.Description: Ingenuity keeps defying expectations. The Mars helicopter, originally designed for only five flights, is now celebrating its 66th, prompting NASA to explore new alternatives for future missions.
stories.Tweet: More helicopters, please! 📦 Ingenuity keeps defying expectations. The Mars helicopter, originally designed for only five flights, is now celebrating its 66th, prompting NASA to explore new alternatives for future missions. #rocketscience https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/nasa-ingenuity-helicopter-rotors/

stories.Title: A new rival for SpaceX?
stories.Description: When it comes to space exploration, China doesn't take any breaks. The country is advancing in the development of full-flow staged-combustion-cycle methane engines comparable to SpaceX's Raptor.
stories.Tweet: A new rival for SpaceX? 📦 When it comes to space exploration, China doesn't take any breaks. The country is advancing in the development of full-flow staged-combustion-cycle methane engines comparable to SpaceX's Raptor. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/china-makes-progress-on-raptor-like-engines-for-super-heavy-rocket/

stories.Title: Efficiency takes flight
stories.Description: Avinxt's robot is set to transform aircraft maintenance. With AI precision, it handles de-icing and quick health checks for planes, saving valuable time and boosting operational efficiency.
stories.Tweet: Efficiency takes flight 📦 Avinxt's robot is set to transform aircraft maintenance. With AI precision, it handles de-icing and quick health checks for planes, saving valuable time and boosting operational efficiency. #ai https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/worlds-largest-ai-robot-reduce-aircraft-inspection

stories.Title: Setting the course
stories.Description: The ESA's JUICE mission, en route to Jupiter, recently executed its longest maneuver in anticipation of a distinctive gravity-assisted flyby around Earth and the moon in 2024.
stories.Tweet: Setting the course 📦 The ESA's JUICE mission, en route to Jupiter, recently executed its longest maneuver in anticipation of a distinctive gravity-assisted flyby around Earth and the moon in 2024. #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/juice-earth-moon-flyby-prep/

stories.Title: How much is enough?
stories.Description: If you're currently exploring deals or simply thinking about upgrading your MacBook Pro, the debate about how much RAM you should get is never-ending. Quick heads up: it depends on your usage.
stories.Tweet: How much is enough? 📦 If you're currently exploring deals or simply thinking about upgrading your MacBook Pro, the debate about how much RAM you should get is never-ending. Quick heads up: it depends on your usage. #apple https://www.macrumors.com/guide/is-8gb-of-ram-enough-for-macbook-pro/

title: Tesla's FSD journey, NASA's push for Ingenuity, Cybertruck steals the show
description: Full self-driving could be just around the corner because when Tesla makes a promise, they really come through. Employee testers are getting a taste of the latest update. Ingenuity is sparking NASA’s interest in helicopters—not the classic ones, of course, but ones specifically made to explore Mars. Lastly, the Cybertruck delivery event is on the horizon, and as that cool electric pickup strolls into Tesla stores, it's grabbing attention everywhere.
